original_text: For the king had taken counsel, and his princes, and all the congregation in Jerusalem, to keep the passover in the second month.
korean_text: 왕이 방백들과 예루살렘 온 회중과 더불어 의논하고 둘째 달에 유월절을 지키려 하였으니

sentences.original_text: For the king had taken counsel
and all the congregation in Jerusalem
to keep the passover in the second month
